content.rendered:
COLOUR & PERMS: Embrace Your Hair's Vibrancy

Experience the best color services and perms at our salon, where we’re dedicated to making your hair aspirations a reality. Explore our Color & Perms offerings, where endless possibilities await to infuse vibrancy and dynamism into your hair.

Explore our Hair Coloring Services:

View our entire pricing list to make your choice easier!

Colour & Style: Starting at

$125

Colour & Cut: Starting at

$160

Colour & Partial Foil & Style: Starting at

$220

Colour & Partial Foil & Cut: Starting at

$240

Colour, Full Foil & Style: Starting at

$250

Colour, Full Foil & Cut: Starting at

$255

Colour Correction [Upon Consultation]: Starting at

$195

Partial Foil & Style: Starting at

$180

Partial Foil & Cut: Starting at

$200

Full Foil & Style: Starting at

$210

Full Foil & Cut: Starting at

$250

Ombre & Style: Starting at

$210

Ombre & Cut: Starting at

$235

Services We Provide:

Ombre (Colour Melting)

Ombre is a hair coloring technique that allows you to achieve a captivating and seamless transition of color. With this method, your hair is artfully transformed into a stunning and natural gradient effect, where different hues gracefully melt into one another. The result is a look that appears as though the sun has naturally lightened and darkened your hair, creating depth and dimension. Ombre is an excellent choice for those seeking a low-maintenance yet visually striking style that adds a touch of glamour to your overall appearance.

Balayage (Highlight Pieces)

Balayage is a hairstyling technique that brings dimension and depth to your hair. This method involves the strategic placement of highlights to enhance your hair's natural movement and radiance. Rather than traditional foil highlights, Balayage creates a more organic and sun-kissed look. The result is beautifully placed highlights that seamlessly blend with your base color, giving your hair a natural and effortless glow. Balayage is perfect for those looking to add a touch of elegance and sophistication to their overall look.

Foils / Highlights

Elevate your look with Foils or Highlights, a versatile hair coloring method that can be customized to your preferences. Whether you desire subtle dimension or bold highlights, our expert stylists will work with you to create a style that complements your unique features and personal style. Foils and highlights allow you to experiment with various shades and intensities, making it easy to achieve a look that enhances your natural beauty and suits your individuality.

Colour

Transform your hair with a vibrant new color. Our range of shades provides you with endless possibilities to express your personality and style. Whether you're drawn to bold, eye-catching hues or prefer a subtle, understated change, our professional colorists can help you find the perfect shade to match your vision. A new hair color can make a dramatic statement or provide a subtle refresh, allowing you to reinvent your look and express your creativity.

Lightening

Lighten and brighten your hair with our expert lightening services. Whether you're seeking a sun-kissed, beachy look or want to go several shades lighter, our skilled stylists can help you achieve the perfect shade that complements your complexion. Lightening your hair can add a youthful and radiant touch to your overall appearance, making you feel refreshed and confident.

Toner

Complete your hair transformation with a toner that enhances and refines your color, leaving your hair looking polished and radiant. Toning is the final step in the coloring process, and it helps to neutralize any unwanted undertones and perfect the overall color. It adds that extra touch of sophistication to your hair, ensuring that your look is well-balanced and visually stunning.

Each of these hair coloring techniques and services offers a unique way to enhance and express your individual style. Our professional colorists are here to guide you in choosing the best option for your hair type, preferences, and goals. Whether you’re looking for a subtle change or a bold transformation, our salon is dedicated to helping you achieve your desired look with precision and creativity.
